Articles.Content: A long time ago I watched a Scott Manley video where he had a plugin that introduced a lot more and unique science messages. I am googling my heart out but without the name I can't find anything. Can someone point me in the right direction?

> 
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102373-Plugin-Delta-0-25-Crowd-Sourced-Science-Under-New-Management](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102373-Plugin-Delta-0-25-Crowd-Sourced-Science-Under-New-Management)

Thank you! I love this community.
